content: this adorable small bunny is part of our kozu palm pets series this little guy is just 4 inches tall with dk yarn and a 2 75mm hook with a chenille yarn and a 3 25mm hook it turned out to be 6 inches tall and with blanket yarn and a 7mm hook a whopping 11 5 inches tall this amigurumi bunny pattern is completely no sew that s right you don t need to pick up your needle to crochet this bunny well except to close the magic_ring or to weave in the ends sorry there s no magic wand for that part yet but we can only dream lol the pattern takes approximately 2 hours from start to finish this listing is for the pdf pattern you can find the pattern for free on our blog at https //chaicoffeecrochet com/small-crochet-bunny/
